about.title: About Me
about.text1: I am a passionate electrical engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining electrical systems across various industries.
about.text2: My expertise spans power systems, control engineering, renewable energy integration, and industrial automation. I am committed to delivering efficient, sustainable, and innovative electrical solutions.
expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
expertise1.title: Power Systems
expertise1.desc: Design and analysis of electrical power generation, transmission, and distribution systems.
expertise2.title: Control Systems
expertise2.desc: Development of control algorithms and automation systems for industrial applications.
expertise3.title: Renewable Energy
expertise3.desc: Integration of solar, wind, and other renewable sources into existing power grids.
expertise4.title: Industrial Automation
expertise4.desc: Design and implementation of automated systems for manufacturing processes.
projects.title: Featured Projects
project1.title: Smart Grid Implementation
project1.desc: Modernization of urban power distribution network with smart monitoring.
project2.title: Automated Manufacturing
project2.desc: PLC-based control system for automotive parts production line.
project3.title: Solar Microgrid
project3.desc: Off-grid solar power system for remote community with battery storage.
